Message.Text: ^#ff0000 You're wearing an item with less than 20% durability left! When an item's durability reaches zero, its stats aren't applied. Better fix it soon!
Collecting an item will affect your chance of collecting additional items.
Affects your chance of success when attempting to collect.

Crafting an item will affect your chance of hitting a jackpot.
Affects your physical damage and chance to block attacks with a shield.
Affects your Maximum HP, HP Regeneration Rate, and Physical Defense.
Affects your Physical Critical Hit and Evasion rates.
Affects your Maximum MP, Magic Damage, and Magic Critical Hit Rate.
Affects your MP Recovery Speed, Magic Defense, and effectiveness of HP recovery skills on a target.
